data.title: Weezer (2008)
data.text:
Weezer

Weezer (The Red Album)

DGC/Interscope

B0011135-02

________________________________________________________________

1. Troublemaker

Produced by Jacknife Lee

2. The Greatest Man That Ever Lived (Varations on a Shaker Hymn)

Produced by Rick Rubin and Weezer

3. Pork and Beans

Produced by Jacknife Lee

4. Heart Songs

Produced by Rick Rubin and Weezer

5. Everybody Get Dangerous

Produced by Rick Rubin and Weezer

6. Dreamin’

Produced by Rick Rubin and Weezer

7. Thought I Knew

(Brian Bell) Published by Nervous Breakdown (ASCAP)

Produced by Weezer

8. Cold Dark World

(Rivers Cuomo/Scott Shriner) Published by E.O. Smith Music (BMI)/SS711Music (ASCAP)

Produced by Weezer

9. Automatic

(Patrick Wilson) Published by Fie! (BMI)

Produced by Weezer

10. The Angel and The One

Produced by Rick Rubin and Weezer

________________________________________________________________

Weezer:

Pat Wilson

Rivers Cuomo

Brian Bell

Scott Shriner

________________________________________________________________

All songs written by Rivers Cuomo, published by E.O. Smith Music (BMI) except as indicated.

Mixed by Rich Costey

Mixing Engineer: Justin Gerrish

Mixed at Avatar Studios, New York, NY

Recorded by Andrew Scheps, David Schiffman, Dana Nielson, Tom McFall

Brian’s engineer at MPAC and sound design and percussion on track 5: Eric J. Dubowsky

Assistant Engineers: Phillip Broussard Jr., Ken Sluiter

Album Production Coordinator: Lindsay Chase

Recorded at: Shangri La Studios, Malibu, CA

Malibu Performing Arts Center, Malibu, CA

Threshold Studios, Santa Monica, CA

Mastered by Dave Collins at Dave Collins Mastering, Los Angeles, CA

Management: Daniel Field at Boom

Booking: Don Muller

International Booking: Marlene Tsuchii

Legal: John Branca and David Lande

Business Management: Bill Vuylsteke & Shelley Venemann at Provident Financial

Publicity: Jim Merlis

Publishing Administration: Randall Wixen

Assistant: Sarah C. Kim

Rack Jobber: Karl Koch

A&R: Luke Wood and Thom Panunzio

Art Direction: Robert Fisher

Photography: Sean Murphy, Karl Koch
